alert.note: Alert for Durham; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 6:53PM EDT until July 31 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wake County in central North Carolina... Southern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 652 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over RDU International, or 7 miles north of Cary, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Wake Forest, Garner, RDU International, Morrisville, Lake Wheeler, Parkwood and William B Umstead State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
